com.k2.Util.Version

Class SimpleVersion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.Util.Version.SimpleVersion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Version

    public class SimpleVersion
extends java.lang.Object
implements Version
    This class is a simple implementation of the Version Interface This is the implementation of the Interface that is retured by calls to the static create(...) methods of the interface
    Author:
    simon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleVersion(int major, int minor, int point)
      Create an instance of the SimpleVersion setting the major, minor and point version numbers.
